noWebUsb.message: This browser does not support WebUSB or it is not enabled.
noWebUsb.suggestion: Use a supported browser such as Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.

oldFirmware.message: A new firmware version is available for this hub. Please install the latest version to use all new features.

newPybricksProfile.message: The connected hub uses a newer Pybricks communication profile version. Some features may not work correctly.
newPybricksProfile.suggestion: Downgrade the hub firmware or upgrade {app} to avoid problems.
